When I got this shirt/blouse is was adorable, fit me great, and was lightweight and cool for summer. The first wear I would have rated it 5 stars. But… then I washed it and I could tell something was off. I still loved it and wore it 5 more times, I also washed it 5 more times. I’m not sure what happened but the elastic is shot, I can’t wear it again because the sleeves constantly fall off and I’d rather not flash anyone. I didn’t read the care instructions so maybe this was supposed to be hand washed, I didn’t check. But I’m not about to hand wash anything. Such a shame, I really liked the shirt!

I bought two of these and love them. Wish they had more designs to choose from. The elastic top part stays in place, makes it so you can bend over and nothing shows. However I don't have huge knockers so it might be different for others. But for middle sized load it works great.

I love the green and black pattern I chose for this top. It's very pretty. The top is quite lightweight and fits well. It seems to be sewn well. Unfortunately, because it's 100% polyester it keeps slipping off my shoulders. The fabric is quite slippery and this happened multiple times during the day, even with a bra under it. It just kept slipping down even though the size was correct. Maybe next time I'll secure it with tiny safety pins. I haven't tested it in very hot, humid weather but I wonder how the polyester will feel in the heat? In any case, it's pretty and I do like it, I just need to solve the slippage problem!

I paid full price, I get NOTHING for this review and this top is 5 Stars..  I ordered the XL 195-200 5'8 38 DD. 评论概述: Pretty blue but not for me
评论详情: This is a pretty top that I ordered for the summer. I loved the blue color and the material looked like it would be cool to wear for hot days. When it arrived, I tried it on immediately and it was all the things I was looking for except for the open back and the size. I hadn’t realized that the back would be that open. I always get cold there and never buy tops that have low open backs. So, the back is a deal breaker for me. For the purposes of size though, I’m 4’10” and 179 lbs. and I ordered the XL. It was too big around and hit me about mid-thigh.

The Women's Shirred Straps Pleated Beach Boho dress is a stunning and versatile piece that embodies both style and comfort. Its shirred straps provide a secure and adjustable fit, while the pleated design adds a touch of elegance and texture to the overall look. The lightweight and flowy fabric make it perfect for beach outings or bohemian-inspired events, allowing you to move freely and comfortably. The boho-chic aesthetic of this dress is accentuated by its relaxed silhouette and flattering pleats, creating a effortlessly stylish ensemble. Whether you're lounging by the beach, attending a summer festival, or exploring a tropical destination, this dress is sure to make a statement with its breezy and feminine appeal.
Love this top so much that I have it in two different colors that I ordered at two different times. Highly recommend.

I really like this shirt! It give great coverage to the point that I don't have to wear a strapless bra with it, which is always ideal. It's very boxy; I would size down if you don't want something that is more flowy. I would definitely get this in another color because I am so happy with this and it has washed really well!
I love this top!!!! The color is stunning and the fit is so flattering. Great quality and sizing is accurate.

This tank top is better than I expected. The color is really lovely and the texture is quite interesting! The straps are wider than a typical tank top, so that makes it easier to wear and adds to the functionality of the top. It has a flowy fit, which aligns with the boho style here. It's less flattering than some tops, since it flows away from the body and has a kind of boxy shape, but that's what I was expecting. It's kind of dual-layered or lined I guess you would say, so the top layer is a bit sheer and doesn't have any stretch, but the underneath layer, the lining, it's a different material that is more opaque and has some stretch to it. Plus, the straps have some elastic stretch to fit a variety of frames. Can be dressed up or down.
Flowy & flattering !

I ordered this as a casual option during hot weather, and this blouse does not disappoint. It’s well-constructed, and the fabric is soft. Ordered my regular size and it fits nice and flowy as expected. Wonderful, easy to wear top. Love it!!

评论概述: Pretty top, fits great, fun for summer daytime looks
评论详情: I would say this top is true to size. Not see through and very comfortable. A fun style for summer daytime looks. I love this brand and have had a lot of good luck with their items. I've even had one of their rompers I bought during covid that stood the test of time forever. I wanted to point out a very picky thing about this tank: while it is really cute, this blue color looks slightly washed out in person, giving it a not brand new look, if that makes sense. It's not terrible and again, I'm being really picky and you might not feel the same way when you see it in person. It's not too far off from the model photos at all, I just expected it to look a little more crisp. It's why I took a star off and I think it's slightly overpriced as well.

I am about 4 months postpartum. So I am at this weird point and trying to get somewhat of a body back and shed baby weight. Confidence hasn’t been there lately..  But, I love this! I love this top! The green color looks fantastic on my skin tone although the green is a little bit darker than I expected in comparison to the product photos. Also, for reference, I'm 5'2" and weigh 140 lbs. The ruffle straps are super cute, aren't too long, and stay in place. The bottom part of it is flowy and looks great, especially since I'm thicker in my torso. Overall, the material is soft, it's not see-through, and drapes very well.
Super frilly and feminine. The material is lite but not see through. It’s true to size and is very cute on.
